_header: A-comen good and windy winter a dry summer
_description: Prognostications based on the dominical letter — in couplets

HunHM64.First Lines:
A comyn good & wynde wynter a drye somerDirthe of corne
                    lightenynge & thonder…
HunHM64.Last Lines:
…Moche fire persshynge full harde begoonLitill wyne from
                    vyntauge withe schippis come
HunHM64.Editions:
Mooney,  Linne R. 
             “Practical Didactic Works in Middle English.” 
         Diss. Toronto, 1981: 353-6.
